documentType: FBI intelligence report or case summary
summary: This document appears to be an FBI or law enforcement intelligence summary on Jeffrey Epstein, referencing his black book, flight manifests, and various open-source investigations into his activities from 1988 to 2021. It includes database checks and mentions multiple media reports about Epstein's sex crime investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the intelligence report, referenced in connection with flight manifests, his black book, and a sex-crime investigation.

events.title: Open source investigation period
events.description: Timeframe referenced for open-source investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's activities.

keyFacts: The document references Jeffrey Epstein's 'Black Book' and flight manifests, indicating interest in his contacts and travel patterns.
It notes an open-source investigation covering a period from October 1988 to December 2021.
The document cites multiple media reports, including from New York Magazine, about Epstein's sex-crime investigation and his 'dangerous dream world'.
